Unusual network connections originating.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for connections originating from ESXi host management IPs. Filter for connections to unexpected ports, external IPs, or unusual internal IPs. Use time series analysis to detect spikes or changes in connection volume/destinations from these sources.

Process creation events on guest Windows.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 logs on guest VMs. Identify processes created by vmtoolsd.exe or vmtoolsd. Use correlation analysis to link these process creations to other suspicious events on the host or network activity observed in Zeek logs.
